title: [娱乐]迷你游戏派对V1.0 ——每个小游戏60秒长[CB1.7.2-RO.2]
author: choak
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:34 编辑 

这里先说明了··服务器不够强大的 不要装了 超费内存···作者提醒
你还在看籽岷大大玩的 60秒一个 60秒一个的小游戏连续吗？ 不用想了 下载吧（你内存够大）
Minigames Party
这里可以让每个小游戏弄到60秒长而且变换 这个插件还在查找“八哥”（BUG）中 我会尽快找到并且上传以最快速度上传最好
可以添加
HorseRacingSpleefBomberColorMatchMineFieldSeaBattlejumpnrun未来计划:
sheepfreenzy, Frostbite etc.
Setup1.设置一个大厅（嘎嘎）2. 指令/mp setlobby3. 去某处位置大厅下（X，Z都不重要，只有Y··原句照搬4. /mp setup5. （你们都喜欢的）创建一个加入的牌子（把[party]写在第2行)
指令：/mp help/mp setlobby | sets the main lobby /mp setup | used for the setup at the beginning /mp list | lists all loaded minigames /mp stats | shows your player statistics /mp leave | leaves the game /mp join | joins the game /mp setcomponent [minigame] [component] | this command changes any component of a minigame, e.g. spawn, lobby, spectatorlobby, finish 
图片 原来照搬
你要做的添加更多的小游戏 （感谢某位的提醒）
以下 不是很重要了 不用翻译了吧
Additional InformationYour server should have at least 1gb ram, as this plugin is fairly resource intensive. You can find my github with this plugin here. You can download Colormatch as a seperate plugin here. Have fun :)
Other strange technical stuff[size=80%]This plugin utilises Hidendra's plugin metrics system, which means that the following information is collected and sent to mcstats.org:
[size=80%]A unique identifier[size=80%]The server's version of Java[size=80%]Whether the server is in offline or online mode[size=80%]The plugin's version[size=80%]The server's version[size=80%]The OS version/name and architecture[size=80%]The core count for the CPU[size=80%]The number of players online[size=80%]The Metrics version
[size=80%]This plugin utilizes an external version checking system (well actually just the updater), which means that the plugin makes a connection to curseforge.com and the following may occur:
[size=80%]The plugins version checked against approved files[size=80%]Downloading of the plugin files[size=80%]Launching of the plugin files downloaded 
[size=80%]You can disable the check and/or automated download via the configuration of this plugin. - just set auto_updating to false, I don't recommend that though because of future quick bugfixes.
